name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flash Light: Illuminate Your Web Experience

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulate a flashlight effect on any webpage, with customizable beam size, intensity, and color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flash Light lets you explore any webpage as if you’re using a flashlight! When activated, the screen darkens, leaving only a bright circular area that follows your mouse pointer—just like a flashlight beam. Customize the flashlight’s size, brightness, and color to suit your preferences. Perfect for focusing on specific content, creating a unique browsing experience, or just having fun! Simply toggle it on or off to switch between normal and flashlight mode.
